[enemy]
# Skeleton Mage
type=skeletonmage
location=8,17,1,1

[enemy]
# 2 Skeleton
type=skeleton
location=4,17,3,3
level=1,1
number=2,2

[event]
# Chest
type=on_trigger
location=15,13,1,1
hotspot=location
loot=1,16,13,fixed,1
mapmod=object,15,13,206
repeat=false
tooltip=Chest
